markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elven Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=13) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 40 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've studied in traditional elven arts, learning about arcane magic and the world around you. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) and [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Elven Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Elven Lore
